Release LTS.468.4 of October 3, 2025
New features
The new "Calendar booking" widget provides the ability to quickly and conveniently make an appointment for available time slots.
The new "QR code" widget was developed to create and place QR codes on object visuals.
On the
extended Kanban board
, it is now possible to sort task cards.
The height of attribute groups and tabs can now be managed using a new option.
In the
structural diagram
, the option to sort columns was added.
The configuration of key phrases in the
decision tree
became more flexible. They can now be defined simultaneously as text and as buttons, leading further to an action according to the scenario.
At the ETL "Source. File" stage, the option to parse files with the "JSON" extension was added.
It is now possible to set the
lock duration
of a user account in case of unsuccessful password entry attempts.
The option to configure websocket connection parameters was added.
Access to objectChatsWebHookPlugin is now controlled by the "Access to Object Chats Webhook Plugin" permission.
Working with electronic documents became more convenient due to the introduction of pagination with the ability to go to a specified page.
Users with the permission to edit a
document
can now manage access permissions to the electronic document directly from its interface.
The transfer of text formatting when uploading a new version from a file was implemented.
Changes and improvements
The loading of the main menu was optimized.
The object opening through a configured
main menu item
was corrected.
The ability to change the position of the switch using the Enter hotkey was adjusted.
Data entry in modal windows with hidden parameters was stabilized.
When configuring an attribute to inherit permissions from a related object, filtering by current and parent types was added.
The attribute composition of the "User privilege level" type was corrected.
To stabilize performance in primitive types, the display of the "Object type" parent attribute was hidden.
For the attribute with the "Private input" input type, the automatic substitution of data was removed.
The restriction on editing attributes was stabilized according to the existing locking algorithm.
The validation check of data in the object instance was adjusted.
The creation of instances through an object attribute of the type linked in the "Delete object duplicate" action was adjusted.
The closing of the object attribute dropdown list after selecting a value was adjusted.
The default settings of the translation service were corrected and the handling of network exceptions was improved.
The opening of objects when their visual contains an attribute with the active multiline display option was stabilized.
Working with installed objects containing an object attribute with the
"Integrated object profile"
visual was adjusted.
When selecting values in the dropdown list, the building of the hierarchy list from the root node was adjusted.
The display of data in a chained attribute of the "File" type was corrected.
The ability to sign files added to an attribute with the
"File attachment visual for signing"
was stabilized.
In the search filters, the option to hide the search line was added.
The support for the
"Chose instance type field"
option when displaying an object attribute in the registry was stabilized.
In registry edit mode with the active "Hide column names" setting, the ability to drag and drop an object into a folder was stabilized.
The filtering and search filter settings of the registry were modernized.
The ordering of attributes in the
registry column filter
according to the specified sorting was adjusted.
The addition of previously selected values in the registry not corresponding to the current search query was stabilized.
The operation of nested lock algorithms, column styles, and styling in registries was corrected.
When returning to the previous page from the
start page
settings, the ability to re-enter the configuration mode was stabilized.
The display of the
frame
according to the selected object was adjusted.
The content of the user password validation modal window was updated.
The expansion of previously collapsed hierarchy dropdown lists was adjusted.
The data display area when switching pages in the registry was corrected.
The hiding/display of the toolbar according to the defined settings was adjusted.
The object visuals containing
boolean attributes
of the “Boolean attribute as a checkbox” and “Boolean attribute as a toggle” types were adjusted.
The operation of the lock algorithm applied to an
attribute group
was corrected.
In the
"Rating"
widget, the display of ratings is now performed in descending order of points.
In the
"Object registry"
widget, the ability to create a registry via the context menu was added.
The automatic data update in the
"External frame"
widget when switching an object in the related
"Child object list"
widget was adjusted.
The handling of errors caused by an incorrect API key when using the Yandex map in the
"Map with objects"
analytical dashboard or in the
"Point on the map"
widget was improved.
For convenience, the object type selection in the
"Object registry"
widget settings is now presented as a hierarchy.
The display of the
"Tip"
widget was improved.
For the
"Button"
and
"Text"
widgets, the ability to open help documentation from the elements panel was added.
The application of color and lock algorithms in the
"Button" widget
was corrected.
The loading of the list of employees responsible for a task was optimized.
The condition for displaying the hint when taking a task into work was corrected.
On the
"Kanban board"
analytical dashboard, the creation of tasks through stage settings was adjusted.
The position of the employee avatar on the task card of the
Kanban board
was changed.
On the
Kanban board
, the display of the task counter, the placement of the task card in the defined cell, and the hyperlink transition from the task card were adjusted.
The loading of the
Kanban board
for the object type with configured access control by the condition tree was stabilized.
On the task card of the
Kanban board
, the application of the configured parameters and the attribute styling was adjusted.
The performance of
dashboards
with control elements based on the data source was optimized.
In
dashboards
, the ability to download charts and diagrams in *.pdf format was stabilized.
In the
"Table"
analytical dashboard, the number of pinned rows and the visibility of the column according to the defined settings were adjusted when displaying and exporting.
In the
"Table"
analytical dashboard, the application of the defined column formatting style was stabilized and the ability to search for an object when configuring a hyperlink was restored.
For the correct
data drill-down decryption
between analytical panels, the updating of dashboard data source parameter settings was improved.
When changing the value of a control parameter, the reset of previously selected filter values in the
"Table"
analytical dashboard was adjusted.
A restriction on entering an integer parameter value when generating a report in the
SQL-based data source
was added.
The "Tools" panel of the algorithm editor of the "Algorithm. Condition for Visual based on context" type was enhanced with the
alg
function.
The check for invalid algorithm code was improved.
When creating an algorithm of the "Algorithms. Object profiles" type through the modal window, the automatic selection of the algorithm placement folder was adjusted.
To optimize algorithm execution when retrieving an object identifier, loading child attribute values is no longer required.
The work of the
setPlainObject
function was adjusted.
The work of the
custom action
for calling an algorithm with saving the current object in a modal window and when creating an object in the
registry edit mode
was adjusted.
The action launch process for algorithm execution without selected values of the object attribute involved in the algorithm was stabilized.
The scenario of returning to the previous page after performing an action in the object was improved.
The execution of the batch action for saving and adding files was adjusted.
In the
condition tree
, the check for access group inclusion in the "Configured groups" was adjusted, and the ability to compare an attribute of the "Date"/"DateTime" type with a null value was improved.
The configuration of data filtering when creating a date comparison condition was stabilized.
The attribute composition of the "ETL. Connection to external DB" [SYS_ETL_DB_CONNECT] type was debugged.
The execution of the ETL process with multiple parallel traces was adjusted.
The list of supported formats for date processing was extended.
When working with the composite file storage, error logging for file upload and deletion was added.
The notification template for confirming
registration
via e-mail was changed.
The parameters for configuring the
e-mail account
were improved.
When generating object models for the AI assistant, a single technical user will now be used.
Changing the parent of a child object is now possible only if the "Write" permissions exist on both the current and the new parent objects.
The process of granting access permissions is now accompanied by the automatic removal of the opposite permission mark (allowing and denying).
The display of error when trying to open an object without access permissions was improved.
Granting access to the object profile navigation window for a user without administrative permissions was stabilized.
The ability to pause and resume the normative term for a user without the permission to edit instances of the "WF. Regulatory term instance" type was restored.
The time for
installing
the update package was optimized.
As a result of improvements, changes on the visual received during
update
remain unchanged after the
cache reset
of the application.
The
update creation
considering deleted attributes in the object composition configuration was adjusted.
The access permissions check for editing a primitive object type instance was corrected.
The duplication of
extensions
in the child type after
update installation
was fixed.
The logic of creating user session records in the audit during system processes execution was improved.
In the session list, the option to sort was added.
The restoration of the previously used page by user after re-authorization caused by session termination was improved.
The display of the defined login method on the login page after user session termination was adjusted.
Application vulnerabilities were fixed.
The process of
clearing temporary files
was optimized.
To reduce the load on the DBMS, an "obj_id" index was added to the "sys_delete_obj" table.
The visibility of the "Export calculation" button for the "Temporary calculation result (UUID)" [CALC_CARD_RISK_RESULT] attribute can now be controlled through attribute options.
The configuration of actions for report recognition of the Analysis of Financial and Economic Activity Module was improved.
When moving to review or copying a version, the ability of multiple users to work with the same version was adjusted.
The deletion of list items with automatic renumbering was adjusted.
The access permissions check when creating a new version and when uploading document metadata was improved.
The display of data in the survey sheet was adjusted.
The ability to check values by cells in the exported document was stabilized.
The editing of footnote content was adjusted.
The voice message duration data is now added to the file metadata.
The process of creating a chat was adjusted.
For registries with a configured
combined header
, support for displaying data excluding the combined header itself was added.
For the Android-based app, the display of loading results when entering a search query was adjusted.
The support for user password security settings was added.
The display of dates of attached files was corrected and the process of selecting uploaded media files was improved.
The process of downloading the
meeting
recording was optimized.
